name: Steele Zamora
description: The Suzuki Gixxer FI ABS has a very responsive engine as well, however, compared to the previous version

name: Roxanne Rojas
description: My Yamaha R15 V3 Bs6 is still going through a break-in. I am riding the bike properly according to the break-in period.

name: Lara Berry
description: learned to ride a bike in secret when I was in class eighth. I learned to ride a bike with a friend's father's bike Honda H100s. Dhaka is a city of traffic jams.

name: Mcgowan Justice
description: On the bike I am using a 20w40 grade shell Advance Mineral Engine Oil. Which I bought with 400 BDT. No parts of the bike have been changed so far.

name: Coleen Lara
description: Since the bike was bought second-hand for running 15,000 km, I did not get any free service. I hired one of my local mechanics and he worked on my bike quite well.

name: Ingram Gomez
description: The bike is much smaller and lighter in shape. Many people think that if it is a low CC bike or a light bike, it is difficult to ride on the highway.
